name: CD Room (almost_somebody)
description:
Excited that this it the first game I've ever finished! This entire game was made in 14 hours from start to finish.

I created every model, song, and sound effect in the game from scratch. There is 1 texture in this entire game I didn't make, you'll see what I mean when you play it. Trust me.

Controls -

W A S D: Movement

Space: Jump

E: Interact

Escape: Quits Game
